name: com.pathightree.spacenavigator-driver
description:
Driver for 3DConnexion devices
This driver lets you fly around your scene and allows you to move items around.
It can also be used at runtime via scripting.

samples.description: A collection of samples to illustrate how to work with the driver at runtime via scripting.

Tool which writes all HID device descriptors to disk.
Please supply this data when reporting an issue with an unsupported 3dconnexion device.
